title: How To Survive A Freakin’ Bear Attack: And 127 Other Survival Hacks You'll Hopefully Never Need
features: Would you know what to do if a bear charged at you?
What about if you were out driving and an earthquake struck?
What about if you were bitten by a snake in the middle of nowhere, or caught in an avalanche while out skiing or hiking?
What if you found yourself the sole survivor of some awful incident, and had to make a new home for yourself stranded on a desert island?
Would you know how to spear a fish, or how to distill pure water using only a plastic bottle?
keywords: how to survive a freakin’ bear attack: and 127 other survival hacks you'll hopefully never need
by bill o'neill how to survive a freakin’ bear attack: and 127 other survival hacks you'll hopefully never need
